body: I'm trying to learn ladybug for dynamo, and when I used the sunpath component, it's fine when turned off the annual sunpath, but got error when turned it on. I just used the sample file in the package.  Any one can help?

replies.body: Hi Qinheng, You should have probably posted this question to Dynamo forum but in any case I just opened your file with the latest version of ladybug for dynamo and it works with no issues. Just try to update ladybug. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9M8ZSgZ5BuVWXURHSq50-kwCeMEcyTMGFV1X*c761WValNm8UMR5oIlCWosGNTl9hyeXt8jI4Tnc5GA9rf7BjnPbCzuNroaA/dynamo_sunpath.PNG)
